variations.description: Attacks the enemies in the back row twice, each dealing Physical DMG equal to 48% of ATK and increasing Crit Chance by 6% for 5s. Can stack up to 30%.
Attacks the enemies in the back row twice, each dealing Physical DMG equal to 56% of ATK and increasing Crit Chance by 6% for 5s. Can stack up to 30%.
Attacks the enemies in the back row twice, each dealing Physical DMG equal to 64% of ATK and increasing Crit Chance by 6% for 5s. Can stack up to 30%.
Attacks the enemies in the back row twice, each dealing Physical DMG equal to 72% of ATK and increasing Crit Chance by 6% for 5s. Can stack up to 30%.
Attacks the enemies in the back row twice, each dealing Physical DMG equal to 80% of ATK and increasing Crit Chance by 6% for 5s. Can stack up to 30%.
Attacks the enemy with the lowest Health 6 times, each attack dealing Physical DMG equal to 60% of ATK. When the target is below 50% Health, deals 50% more damage.
Attacks the enemy with the lowest Health 6 times, each attack dealing Physical DMG equal to 70% of ATK. When the target is below 50% Health, deals 50% more damage.
Attacks the enemy with the lowest Health 6 times, each attack dealing Physical DMG equal to 80% of ATK. When the target is below 50% Health, deals 50% more damage.
Attacks the enemy with the lowest Health 6 times, each attack dealing Physical DMG equal to 90% of ATK. When the target is below 50% Health, deals 50% more damage.
Attacks the enemy with the lowest Health 6 times, each attack dealing Physical DMG equal to 100% of ATK. When the target is below 50% Health, deals 50% more damage.
Increases Physical DMG dealt by 2.5% for each damage taken, up to 25%. Can trigger once every 2 seconds.
Increases Physical DMG dealt by 5% for each damage taken, up to 50%. Can trigger once every 2 seconds.
